name: Automator
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Smart Tags are self-adhesive, made from robust silicone and they contain an optimized NFC chip. Just hold your smartphone close to a Smart Tag to trigger preset Alexa Routines.

Room Locator enables digital room recognition by use of the innovative iBeacon technology. Preset Alexa Routines are triggered entirely automatically when you enter or leave a room.

Enable the Automator skill for Amazon Alexa, sign in with your Automator Account and create an Alexa Routine.

This skill is only for owners of LinkDesk products: LinkDesk Smart Tags, LinkDesk Room Locator

For further information on the Automator app and LinkDesk products please visit: www.linkdesk.com

We’re always happy to help. Please contact us if you have any questions or suggestions: support@linkdesk.com
